short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Protect your email inbox from spam, bots and phishing with Mail4QA, the solution for secure disposable temporary email addresses.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Experience hassle-free disposable email services with Mail4QA Disposable Email, the official Google Chrome extension by mail4qa.com. Safeguard your primary email address from spam, newsletters, and unwanted promotional emails by generating temporary and secure email addresses on the fly.

# Key Features:

*Instant Email Generation:* Create disposable email addresses quickly and effortlessly.
*One-Click Copy:* Easily copy generated email addresses to your clipboard for quick use.
*Auto-refresh:* Keep your temporary email address active with automatic inbox refresh.
*Customization:* Personalize your disposable email address for specific needs.
Protect your inbox and maintain online privacy with Mail4QA Disposable Email. Simplify your testing, sign-ups, and online interactions without compromising your primary email address. Install the extension now and embrace a clutter-free inbox experience!
